title: make nasus unable to q fucking towers
body: seriously just lost a game because this nasus could backdoor towers and 2 shot them with his q, its fucking stupid he can q towers for 1200 damage. he never team fought an his team lost every single 1 but with ghost and his ult he was impossible to catch out he could just 2 shot towers run and then tp to a dif lane an 2 shot that tower.
